benchmark_details.name: DataRaceBench V1.4.1 and DataRaceBench-ML V0.1
benchmark_details.overview: DataRaceBench is an open-source benchmark suite that assesses data race detection tools, while DataRaceBench-ML is a derived dataset specifically designed to support machine learning methodologies in detecting data races.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a benchmark for assessing data race detection tools and facilitate machine learning in data race detection.

data.source: Open-source codes from relevant data race studies adapted for DataRaceBench format.
data.annotation: Labels indicating the presence of data races and details of associated variables.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are derived from the performance of machine learning models in detecting data races.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy and F1 scores indicate better performance in identifying data races.
